properties.name: com.deptagency.sqlexplain.enabled
properties.description: Boolean property true or false if to enable running and logging explain plans for queries'

properties.name: com.deptagency.sqlexplain.query_cache_expiry
properties.description: The period between when an explain plan for a query should be run again

properties.name: com.deptagency.sqlexplain.max_cache_size
properties.description: The total number of queries to keep in cache used to determine if an explain plan has been run recently for a query
